评论详情: Pants were delivered on time.  The Mondetta pants are soft and warm.

Mandetta is a very good brand and definitely worth the price. I first became a fan when buying a pair of "Performance + Luxury" style joggers that were thicker than an average jogger. I have yet to find those exact ones and this particular style is on the thin side, but the color is really pretty and extremely comfortable. They have a wide waistband that is very forgiving and would help anyone who worries about extra "skin" coming out over the top of their pants. I personally wear my joggers larger than I think they are supposed to be worn but that's how I am the most comfortable. With that being said, for this particular pair, I should have sized down.  For a point of reference I am 5'10 155 pounds with a waste of 30 and hips of 38 inches.
I really like these pants. They are so comfortable….AND…..have pockets! It should be illegal to sell pants without pockets.IYKYK

Pretty nice, lighter weight jogger.  I like the pockets and the fabric is comfortable but on the thinner side so not for winter.  The print of the fabric looks more like a blend of black and green but it goes with both colors anyhow.
Love how cozy these are. Good thickness for warmth.  My weekend pants.

评论概述: Great fit, very comfortable and flattering.
评论详情: I love these joggers. I have others from this company I got at Costco, and I love the look.

These joggers are great. They are a very soft fabric and are so comfortable to wear around. The pockets are a very good size (will easily fit your phone) and the pants are true to size. I was introduced to them at a large wholesale club store, and when they stopped carrying them, I was so happy to have found them here. Multiple pairs have been ordered, so hopefully I'm set for a while. Definitely recommend.
I have a few in other colors that I got from Costco a while back, I’m glad I was able to find another color!
I wish I could find more pants like these on Amazon. Love this brand! They have these at Costco and they’re wonderful!
I have several pair of these and love them. My only concern was the burgundy (the last pair) was shorter.
